Contact Us

We are working to implement a new customer service center. In the mean time, please use the following channels to reach out to us:

  • All customers and users are encouraged to join the Powerline Poweruser group to openly discuss new features, bugs, and ideas relating to our efforts and mission

  • For customer support-related requests, please e-mail support@powerli.ne

  • For developer issues, please e-mail dev@powerli.ne

  • For partnerships, research, or media, please e-mail jesse@powerli.ne

We can also be reached at 908-433-5678. Thanks!
